Twitch has responded to feedback from gamers with disabilities by agreeing to remove the term "blind playthrough" from its tag list.
Back in June, accessibility advocate and COO of Able Gamers Steve… [+2011 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Knezevic
articles.title: Free Xbox Games With Gold For December 2020 Available Now - GameSpot
articles.description: Here are this month's free Xbox One and Xbox 360 games for Xbox Live Gold and Game Pass Ultimate subscribers.
articles.content: December is finally here, which means a new batch of Xbox Games with Gold is now available for Xbox Live Gold and Game Pass Ultimate subscribers. The December free games once again include four title… [+1481 chars]
